TopicTitle: Avro Vulcan V I. - It's Back! [Dedicated to my friends at Zokesia Skunkworks]

Articles.Content:
Introducing, the Avro Vulcan! The arrow of the British Empire during the Cold War, the Argentinians sure got a taste of her capabilities during the raid on Port Stanley.

Stay tuned for the version of this armed with skybolt missiles.

Download your way, citizen. [https://www.dropbox.com/s/2k9mtykh5jbyp51/Avro%20Vulcan%20Victory%20Day.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/2k9mtykh5jbyp51/Avro%20Vulcan%20Victory%20Day.craft?dl=0)

Press 1 to toggle bomb bays.

This thing handles like a beauty at all altitudes with its extreme stability and 6-9 G bombing maneuvers. The landing gear is extremely robust, and it takes off at 40 m/s along with a ridiculous fuel load and 240 m/s low altitude cruising speed.

I think this may be one of the rare KSP replicas that are larger the the real craft.![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Thanks for the dedication, but I don't think I want this one as much as last time ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
